content: निर्देशः {@--1@} Pointing out, showing, indicating. {@--2@} Order, command, direction; <ls>R. 12. 17.</ls> {@--3@} Advice, instruction. {@--4@} Telling, saying, declaring. {@--5@} Specifying, particularization, specification, specific mention; अयूक्तोयं निर्देशः <ls>Mbh.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 17. 23.</ls> {@--6@} Ascertainment. {@--7@} Vicinity, proximity. {@--8@} Description, designation.
